name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Displaying the list of 'Bento' (lunch box) gift participants.
Event poster display with rules regarding screenshots and social media.
Displaying the list of 'Flower Stand' gift participants.

subtitles.original: 終わらない　私の未来も
subtitles.english: My future is never-ending, too.

subtitles.original: 失敗も全部　私色だよ
subtitles.english: Even my failures are all my color.

subtitles.original: 気づかない　気づかないでいて　可愛いだけの私でいい
subtitles.english: Don't notice, please don't notice, I'm fine being just a "cute girl".

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the show starts.

subtitles.original: スクリーンショットをSNSにアップロード投稿OK / SNSでの感想投稿OK
subtitles.english: Upload and post screenshots to SNS OK / OK to post your impressions on SNS

subtitles.original: 録画、録音、ミラー配信や違法アップロードは固く禁止します。
subtitles.english: Recording, recording, mirror distribution, and illegal uploading are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: 胸に詰め込んだ　夢はくしゃくしゃで
subtitles.english: The dreams I've packed in my chest are all crumpled up,

subtitles.original: 勇気がいるけど　君にだけは見せようかななんてね
subtitles.english: And I need courage, but maybe I'll show them only to you. Just kidding!

subtitles.original: 一緒にゆけるかな　秘密の場所を
subtitles.english: I wonder if we can go together, to that secret place...

subtitles.original: 渡してゆこう
subtitles.english: Let's pass it on.

subtitles.original: 深呼吸　そしてパッと言葉
subtitles.english: A deep breath, and then the words pop out.

subtitles.original: 空、誰にももらっちゃうくらい
subtitles.english: Sora, so much that anyone would take them.

subtitles.original: 最高のヒロインを　上手くいかない今日だって
subtitles.english: The best heroine, even on days when things don't go well,

subtitles.original: 教科書見ずに閉じちゃったら　なんてやりそうだ
subtitles.english: I might just close the textbook without looking—that's so like me.

subtitles.original: 落書きのなかに隠してた思いを
subtitles.english: The feelings I kept hidden within my doodles,

subtitles.original: 君とこうして分かち合えたなんて
subtitles.english: Being able to share them with you like this...

subtitles.original: 嘘みたいだなぁ
subtitles.english: ...it feels like a dream.

subtitles.original: もっと　またたいて印して
subtitles.english: Twinkle even more, and leave your mark.

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつかな　成長できるかな
subtitles.english: One step at a time, I wonder if I can grow?

subtitles.original: 共に明日を　駆け抜けよう
subtitles.english: Let's run through tomorrow together.

subtitles.original: ドンドン増えた　宝物の中
subtitles.english: Amidst the treasures that keep on growing,

subtitles.original: リボン添えて　繋いでゆこう
subtitles.english: Let's add a ribbon and tie them together.

subtitles.original: 立ち止まらないよ　楽しかった日々ほら
subtitles.english: I won't stop, look at those happy days!

subtitles.original: 昨日よりも加速してる
subtitles.english: They're accelerating even more than yesterday.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと繋いでて
subtitles.english: Make sure to hold on tight.

subtitles.original: 簡単じゃないホームの　かけ声は
subtitles.english: The cheers at our home base, which isn't easy,

subtitles.original: いつも君が明るく放って　支えてくれる
subtitles.english: You always call them out brightly and support me.

subtitles.original: ずっと　刻まれて光るよ
subtitles.english: They'll be etched in my heart and shine forever.

subtitles.original: 三つ数えたら　砂に書いた絵
subtitles.english: If you count to three, the drawing in the sand...

subtitles.original: 消えてしまうけど　それと同じで
subtitles.english: ...will disappear, and just like that...

subtitles.original: 君の顔ばかり　浮かべてたら
subtitles.english: ...if I keep imagining your face...

subtitles.original: アイスみたいに　とろけては
subtitles.english: ...I'll start to melt just like ice cream.
